desc: Add or remove a key protector to or from a key
Set key protector to use (only tpm2 is currently supported)
Set the bank of PCRs used to authorize key release: SHA1, SHA256, SHA384, or …
Set the path to the TPM2 device.  (default: \\,/dev/tpm0\\/)
Evict a previously persisted SRK from the TPM, if any
Set the path to a file that contains the cleartext key to protect
Set the path to the file that will contain the key after sealing (must be acc…
Set a comma-separated list of PCRs used to authorize key release e. g
Set the SRK handle if the SRK is to be made persistent
